h1: How Many Calories in a Cinema Popcorn?

quick_answer.text: A medium serving of buttered cinema popcorn contains about 535 kcal, with high fat from added oils.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cinema popcorn without butter?
faqs.a: About 285 kcal for a plain medium serving of 100 g.

faqs.q: Is cinema popcorn high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 900 mg per medium serving due to added salt.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a cinema popcorn?
faqs.a: Approximately 35 g total fat, including 6 g saturated, from butter and oil.

faqs.q: How do calories vary by cinema chain?
